role.argrole: to whom / what? (usually marked by ل)

example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حاول) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM القائمون)) (PP (PREP علي) (NP (NP (PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:SJ يجعلو) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-4 (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC مشابهاً) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لبرنامج) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاصلي) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN المثيل))
